definition: Light in August (novel by William Faulkner 威廉·福克納|威廉·福克纳[Wei1 lian2 · Fu2 ke4 na4])

sentences.english: If you have insurance under a student plan, it probably will end in mid-August.
sentences.chinese: 如果你買的是學生險，保險可能會在八月中旬到期。

sentences.english: A narrow path in the field, this sadness in August.
sentences.chinese: 田裏一窄條路，八月裏這憂愁？

sentences.english: I was born on August the third of nineteen ninety-nine.
sentences.chinese: 我在一九九九年八月三號出生。

sentences.english: The Mid-Autumn Day is on the August 15th of the lunar calendar.
sentences.chinese: “中秋節”是在農曆八月十五這一天。

sentences.english: "Duets II" celebrates his eighty-fifth on August third.
sentences.chinese: “二重奏II”慶祝他在八月第三第八十五。

sentences.english: We're still in with a chance of winning every tournament we entered in August.
sentences.chinese: 我們仍然有機會贏出所有在八月開始參加的錦標賽。

sentences.english: We have noted your letter of August 5 under the above caption .
sentences.chinese: 我們注意到你方上述標題下的八月五日來信。

sentences.english: There\'s heat in the breathless August day already.
sentences.chinese: 沒有一絲風的八月天，熱氣已經開始襲來。

sentences.english: Protesters in August forced the closing of a chemical plant in Dalian.
sentences.chinese: 八月，抗議者們迫使大連一家化工廠關閉。

sentences.english: The school will enroll new students in August.
sentences.chinese: 這所學校將於八月份招收新生。

sentences.english: We will take all refunding actiion finished before end of August.
sentences.chinese: 我們將會在八月底前處理完所有的退票帳款。

sentences.english: You need to enrol before the end of August.
sentences.chinese: 你必須在八月底前註冊。

sentences.english: For me, the biggest milestone is that we have reached August.
sentences.chinese: 對我來說，最大的里程碑就是進入了八月。

sentences.english: In August, Putin seemed to predict this kind of escalation.
sentences.chinese: 今年八月，普京似乎預測這類事件的升級。

sentences.english: Chushu solar terms in each year around August 23.
sentences.chinese: 處暑節氣在每年八月二十三日左右。

sentences.english: An outside review of the Geodon data from an auditor won't be complete until August.
sentences.chinese: Geodon數據的外部審查要到八月份才能完成。

definition: first month of the lunar year
